original_text: But then that same servant went away and he met another servant of the king. This other servant had to pay back a debt of 100 silver coins to the first servant. The first servant took hold of the neck of the other servant to hurt him. He said, “Give me the money that is mine.”
korean_text: 그 종이 나가서 자기에게 백 데나리온 빚진 동료 한 사람을 만나 붙들어 목을 잡고 이르되 빚을 갚으라 하매

sentences.original_text: But then that same servant went away
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그때 그 동일한 종은 떠나갔고

sentences.original_text: and he met another servant of the king
This other servant had to pay back a debt
sentences.korean_translation: 이 다른 종은 빚을 갚아야 했다

sentences.original_text: of 100 silver coins to the first servant
The first servant took hold of the neck
of the other servant to hurt him
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 종의 목을 다치게 하기 위해
